pros: A great place to work, humane and takes care of its staff personal, spiritual and professional needs, growth and development. provides for a comprehensive life insurance policy to all its staffs. Service delivery is for the most vulnerable and geared towards improving life even in the worst of all state of life, including natural disasters, wars, resource rights conflicts and women's right.
cons: Does not have a providence fund in an event that a staff has to leave a job for any reason. Need to conduct more monitoring to partners organisation.
